description: Duplicate of 161756VAR - Variation of Condition 18 to Planning Permission PP/2015/4912; Dated 11.04.2016 for 'Redevelopment of the site to construct a part 3 part 4 storey building comprising 15 self-contained flats (4x studio, 7x1 bed, 4x2 bed) and 3 dwelling houses (3-bed), a ground floor commercial unit for retail or financial/professional uses (A1/A2 land use class) and ancillary servicing area; on site car parking spaces with vehicular access from Mandeville Road and Ealing Road; secure cycle parking spaces; a communal outdoor area and landscaping works; refuse and recycling bin sotrage (Revised Scheme)' - Variations to include changing the opening hours to open from 0700 to 2300 Monday to Saturday and 0730 to 2300 on Sundays and Public Holidays. All activity shall cease 30 minuntes after closing times.
